column2: Newbie, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Take TRUVADA at bedtime. If you are taking with ISENTRESS you may experience insomnia. Tylenol PM worked for me. First three weeks were the worst and side effects subsided one at a time. I take it at night cause I get BAD DEPRESSION side effects for about 6 or 7 hours after taking. I try to sleep through those first 6 or 7 hours. It see,ms to work. I have no other drugs to comapre this to.

Have nothing to say but great things about Truvada and Reyataz combination therapy!  This once a day regiment also makes it much easier to handle.

column1: Prevention of HIV Infection after Exposure
column2: DD, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I just finished one month on this drug after exposure to the blood of an HIV infected person.  I hope it worked but will need further blood tests.  I felt mild nausea while taking the drug and these symptoms seemed to get a little worse after I finished treatment. HIV is not just a disease of drug users and gays.  If a 57 year-old, married, hetrosexual, managomous person can be exposed, anyone can!  And thank God for the researchers who have created these drugs.
